basics.name: Paul Charpie
basics.label: Website Developer | WordPress • SEO • PHP • Client Support
basics.summary: Website Developer with 5+ years of experience building and optimizing client websites. Skilled in WordPress development, SEO best practices, and performance optimization. Strong background in PHP, CSS, and JavaScript with a track record of delivering secure, responsive, and high-performing websites. Adept at client communication, troubleshooting, and implementing digital marketing goals.

work.name: Hawkins Computer Services
highlights: Developed and optimized client websites using WordPress, Concrete CMS, and native PHP
Implemented SEO best practices: performance optimization, mobile responsiveness, accessibility, and structured data
Troubleshot and resolved site issues, ensuring fast load times and security compliance
Authored technical documentation and trained clients on managing and updating their websites
Collaborated with clients to align websites with business and marketing goals

work.name: AAM, USA
highlights: Maintained internal and client-facing web tools using PHP, JavaScript, MySQL, and React
Enhanced SEO and usability of e-commerce and marketing sites
Worked closely with clients and internal teams to implement design and functionality updates

work.name: Unbound Digital
highlights: Communicated technical issues and solutions clearly to non-technical clients
Configured hosting environments and managed client websites
Introduced workflows to streamline client support operations

projects.name: Client SEO Website Portfolio
projects.description: Developed and optimized multiple WordPress and Concrete CMS websites for clients. Focused on performance tuning, accessibility, responsive design, and on-page SEO improvements to increase search rankings and lead conversions.

projects.name: Movie Search React Showcase
projects.description: A sample React-based movie search SPA that demonstrates use of third-party API integration, Tailwinds CSS, and design-to-code development from Figma. Optimized for mobile responsiveness and Core Web Vitals performance.

projects.name: Bootstrap Showcase
projects.description: Sample static website demonstrating clean Bootstrap layouts, fast load times, and SEO-friendly structure (meta tags, headers, accessibility best practices).
